com.mindfusion.scheduling

Interface CalendarListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface CalendarListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Defines the events raised by the Calendar component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginItemDrawing(java.util.EventObject e)
      Invoked before the items are drawn in the current drawing pass.
      void customizeGrouping(CustomizeGroupingEvent e)
      Raised when secondary grouping is enabled to allow the client to filter some of the secondary resources.

      • hiddenItemClick

        void hiddenItemClick(DateEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when a hidden items cue icon is clicked.

        The hidden items cue is displayed when there are schedule items included in the time range of the current calendar view, but not currently visible because of insufficient space.

        Parameters:
        e - A DateEvent object.

      • itemClick

        void itemClick(ItemMouseEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when the user clicks a schedule item.
        Parameters:
        e - An ItemMouseEvent object.

      • itemDeleting

        void itemDeleting(ItemConfirmEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when the user is about to delete a schedule item.

        This method can be used to prevent users from deleting specific non-recurring items interactively. The method is invoked once for each element of the item selection. To control the deletion of recurring items, use the CalendarListener.recurringItemDeleting(com.mindfusion.scheduling.RecurringItemConfirmEvent) method.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemConfirmEvent object.

      • recurringItemDeleting

        void recurringItemDeleting(RecurringItemConfirmEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when the user is about to delete a recurring item.

        This method can be used to prevent the deletion of recurring items. For non-recurring items, use the CalendarListener.itemDeleting(com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemConfirmEvent) method.

        Parameters:
        e - A RecurringItemConfirmEvent object.

      • itemDeleted

        void itemDeleted(ItemEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when the user deletes a schedule item.
        Parameters:
        e - An ItemEvent object.

      • itemInplaceEditStarting

        void itemInplaceEditStarting(ItemConfirmEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when in-place editing of item's text is about to begin.

        This method can be used to prevent users from editing the text of specific schedule items.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemConfirmEvent object.

      • itemInplaceEditEnding

        void itemInplaceEditEnding(ItemEditConfirmEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when in-place editing of item's text is about to be accepted.

        This event can be used to validate the text entered into a schedule item during the in-place editing mode.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemEditConfirmEvent object.

      • itemModifying

        void itemModifying(ItemModifyConfirmEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when the user moves or resizes a schedule item, which would change the item's scheduled start or end date and time.

        This method can be used to prevent users from modifying an item interactively.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemModifyConfirmEvent object.

      • itemCreationCanceled

        void itemCreationCanceled(ItemEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when an interactive item creation is canceled by the user.

        This method is invoked when the user presses the cancel key (usually Escape) while in-place editing the text of an item currently being created.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemEvent object.

      • itemSelectionComplete

        void itemSelectionComplete(java.util.EventObject e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when an item is selected or deselected.

        This method is invoked only once unlike CalendarListener.itemSelectionChanged(com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemSelectionEvent) which is invoked for each individual item affected by the selection operation.

        Parameters:
        e - An EventObject object.

      • itemsModified

        void itemsModified(ItemsEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Invoked when one or more items have been modified interactively.

        Unlike CalendarListener.itemModified(com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemModifiedEvent) and CalendarListener.itemListLaneChanged(com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemListLaneChangedEvent), this method is invoked only once for all items that are affected by the modification.

        Parameters:
        e - An ItemsEvent object.

        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Raised when secondary grouping is enabled to allow the client to filter some of the secondary resources.
        Parameters:

      • filterItem

        Description copied from interface: CalendarListener
        Raised to allow filtering specific items from the view.
        Parameters:
        e - An ItemConfirmEvent object.
